name: Trade Capture System
description: A system for capturing and processing client trade files, processing each row as an individual trade record

nodes.name: Trade Capture Service
nodes.description: Service that monitors client trade file directories, ingests trade files, and processes each row as an individual trade record for downstream processing

nodes.name: Trade Capture Database
nodes.description: Database storing ingested trade records for the Trade Capture Service

nodes.name: Client
nodes.description: External client who provides trade files and interacts with the Trade Capture Service

nodes.name: RCADE
nodes.description: Overall system that contains the Trade Capture Service and its database

relationships.description: Service connects to the database to store and retrieve ingested trade records
Client interacts with the Trade Capture Service to provide trade files
RCADE system is composed of the Trade Capture Service and its database
